title: Floop’s Fooglies
description: Join Fegan Floop and the Fooglies, Flower, Tall & Skinny, Too Too, and Donnamight, as they help kids learn to be happy.
quote: So, always remember, whatever you do… believe in yourself!
altHero: Fegan Floop with a person with a thumb for a head
alt1: Flower, Tall & Skinny, Too Too, and Donnamight
alt3: Donnamight, a Fooglie with big teeth and stretched out cheeks
alt4: Floop dancing on a platform under an orange sky surrounded by surrealist floating eyeballs and dancing finger people
